ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] OT - flowers
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup.  Crypt in Mistmoore and also, check you favorite alchemy vendor -- they sell some items look likeflowers as well. Henrik Holm  wrote:
ygData.messageBody:
Yup. Crypt in Mistmoore and also, check you favorite alchemy vendor -- they sell some items look likeflowers as well.
Henrik Holm <HEH@...> wrote: Pick one up in Castle Mistmore it spawns in the crypt i think?

Musiker
